name: New Year Dumpling Making Dinner
description: Family event to practice making dumplings and enjoy a traditional Chinese lion dance in celebration of Chinese New Year

name: Chinatown Lunar New Year Parade
description: Parade celebrating Lunar New Year, featuring traditional dragon and lion dancing teams, colorful floats, marching bands and marching groups.

name: Cultural Voices Luncheon
description: Luncheon to come together as a community, and tell stories to celebrate the legacy of culture in the past, present, and future

name: MWRD AAPI Heritage Month Celebration
description: Celebration of AAPI Month with MWRD focusing on the theme of a legacy of leadership and resilience

name: AANHPI Community Festival
description: Community festival in celebration of Asian American, Native Hawaiian, and Pacific Islander cultures

name: Umbrella Arts Festival
description: Festival in celebration of Asian American history, culture, and art, using umbrellas to symbolize the Asian American diaspora

name: CMAA Red Party
description: A vibrant AAPI men's fashion show bringing together culture, creativity, and community

name: Chinatown Dragon Boat Race
description: Chinese dragon boat race, where 32 dragon boat race teams will compete on the south branch of the Chicago River.

name: 5k and Youth Run
description: Race course on a scenic journey through the Chinatown neighborhood, uniting the community, celebrating heritage, and inspiring new generations of runners

name: Chinatown Summer Fair
description: Outdoor fair in celebration of Asian beauty, culture, food, art and music

name: Dim Sum 5k/10k & Kids Dash
description: Race, fundraiser and community event highlighting the diversity of the Uptown neighborhood, raising money for the community

name: Miss Chinatown Chicago Paegant
description: Major paegant and fundraising event celebrating and uniting the largest gathering of Chinese and American business leaders
